title: Sri Lankans still in line for fuel
body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); While Sri Lankans have been protesting for more than a week over the present criss, people are still waiting in line for gas and fuel across the island.
There were a large number queues in filling stations since Wednesday (6) morning to obtain fuel.
Though people were waiting in line for Diesel, most filling stations had run out of stocks.
NO constitutional provision to ask President to resign – Speaker
